texture.description: The namespace and ID of the texture to use as an overlay.
texture.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the texture to use as an overlay.

strength.description: If the `"texture"` draw mode is used, it determines the alpha (transparency) value of the texture. If the `"nausea"` draw mode is used, it determines the value of how the texture is stretched (1.0 = screen size). Range: 0.0 to 1.0.
strength.markdownDescription: If the `"texture"` draw mode is used, it determines the alpha (transparency) value of the texture. If the `"nausea"` draw mode is used, it determines the value of how the texture is stretched (1.0 = screen size). Range: 0.0 to 1.0.

red.description: Value by which the red component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 to 1.0.
red.markdownDescription: Value by which the red component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 to 1.0.

green.description: Value by which the green component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 to 1.0.
green.markdownDescription: Value by which the green component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 to 1.0.

blue.description: Value by which the blue component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 to 1.0.
blue.markdownDescription: Value by which the blue component of the texture will be multiplied. Range: 0.0 to 1.0.

draw_mode.description: Determines whether to treat black as transparent or draw the texture as is (`"nausea"` or `"texture"` respectively).
draw_mode.markdownDescription: Determines whether to treat black as transparent or draw the texture as is (`"nausea"` or `"texture"` respectively).

draw_phase.description: Determines if the overlay should render below or above the HUD (`"below_hud"` or `"above_hud"` respectively).
draw_phase.markdownDescription: Determines if the overlay should render below or above the HUD (`"below_hud"` or `"above_hud"` respectively).

hide_with_hud.description: Determines if the overlay should be hidden if the HUD elements are hidden (with F1).
hide_with_hud.markdownDescription: Determines if the overlay should be hidden if the HUD elements are hidden (with F1).

visible_in_third_person.description: Determines if the overlay is visible in third person.
visible_in_third_person.markdownDescription: Determines if the overlay is visible in third person.

type.description:
## Overlay

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/overlay)

Applies an overlay to the player's screen.

Type ID: `origins:overlay`




---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:overlay",
    "texture": "minecraft:textures/block/ice.png",
    "strength": 1.0,
    "red": 1.0,
    "green": 1.0,
    "blue": 1.0,
    "draw_mode": "texture",
    "draw_phase": "below_hud",
    "hide_with_hud": false,
    "visible_in_third_person": false
}
```

This example will render an overlay with the texture of an Ice block, below the HUD and is not visible in third person.
type.markdownDescription:

    "green": 1.0,

    "draw_mode": "texture",

    "visible_in_third_person": false

This example will render an overlay with the texture of an Ice block, below the HUD and is not visible in third person.
